container-title: A third book which I must recommend is WHITHAM, G. B., Linear and Nonlinear Waves
title: I highly recommend this book because of the excellent presentation by L

Edie which includes some of the material we have discussed. In addition, other authors in Gazis' book discuss a wide variety of traffic problems including traffic delays, control, generation, distribution, and assignment. These two books are excellent sources of additional references mostly contained in the research literature, many of which are accessible to the reader of this text

note: Furthermore, this book expertly presents various other applied mathematics problems involving wave motion (most from areas of physics).] Index
